responsibilities: Conduct groundbreaking research and development on AI/ML algorithms that underpin the core functionalities of our robotic solutions.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to integrate AI models and data pipelines into real-world robotic applications, ensuring robust and scalable outcomes.
Publish and present research findings in top-tier journals and conferences, contributing to the broader academic and professional communities.
category: Prompt Engineering and Large Language Models (LLMs)
activity: Fine-tuning and customization of language models
analysis: The Job Responsibilities focus on AI/ML algorithms for robotic solutions, collaboration for integration into applications, and publishing research. While fine-tuning language models is a form of AI/ML work, the responsibilities do not specifically mention language models or domain-specific tasks related to language processing. The focus seems to be more on robotics and general AI/ML rather than language models.
